Set Error Capture [ On ]
Set Variable [ $$SCRIPT_TRIGGER ; Value: "Off" ]
New Window [ Style: Floating Document ; Name: "Contact List" ; Height: 820 ; Width: 630 ; Top: Get ( WindowTop ) + 20 ; Left: Get ( WindowLeft ) + Get ( WindowWidth ) - 650 ]
Go to Layout [ “Contact List” ; Animation: None ]
Perform Script [ Specified: From list ; “Trigger | Sort Contact List [Get Script Parameter]” ; Parameter: $$PLATFORM ]
If [ Get ( SystemPlatform ) = 3 ]
Print [ Restore: Select Your Printer ; With dialog: On ]
Close Window [ Current Window ]
Else
Enter Preview Mode [ Pause: Off ]
End If
